sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.IPAddressValidator</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Validates whether given value represents a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.</description>
        <name>IPAddressValidator</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var IPAddressValidator = Class.create();
IPAddressValidator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	ajaxFunction_validateDesktop: function() {
		var table = this.getParameter('table');
		var fields = this.getParameter('fields');
		var values = this.getParameter('values');
		return JSON.stringify(IPAddressDataFormatter.areColumnsValid(table, fields, values));
	},
	
	ajaxFunction_validateMobileAndServicePortal: function() {
		var table = this.getParameter('table');
		var field = this.getParameter('field');
		var value = this.getParameter('value');
		return IPAddressDataFormatter.isColumnValid(table, field, value);
	},
	
	ajaxFunction_validateStrict: function() {
		var ip = this.getParameter('ip_value');

		return SncIPAddress.isValid(ip);
	},

	
    type: 'IPAddressValidator'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>josh.gerbasi</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-11-17 22:38:18</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>68d2e517c38722007bf1bea192d3aeb6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>63</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>IPAddressValidator</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">079c7c036d2220100acb70b3534330b0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_68d2e517c38722007bf1bea192d3aeb6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-23 21:16:52</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>808</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
